issue.title: [Rust] Add `from(Vec<Option<&str>>)` to [Large]StringArray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9921](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9921). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
and deprecate TryFrom, that currently uses a builder.

This should have some performance improvement, and simplifies the interface.

comments.body:
